title: Adjustable seating position
subtitle: Change riders with ease.
content:
Adjustable seating position

Change riders with ease.

The height-adjustable saddle and stem let you adjust the seating position of the Packster 70 to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye, making it the perfect companion to family life and a flexible replacement for your car.
description: The height-adjustable saddle and stem let you adjust the seating position of the Packster 70 to different body heights from 1.50 m to 2.00 m in the blink of an eye, making it the perfect companion to family life and a flexible replacement for your car.
